view
Class TimerComponent

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              view.TimerComponent
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.Observer
public class TimerComponent
extends javax.swing.JComponent
implements java.util.Observer

A timer component is a widget that displays how much time a player has left before he runs out of time and loses the game.

See Also:
Serialized Form
Specification Fields :
timeLeft : int // time left before it ticks down to 0

update

public void update(java.util.Observable a,
                   java.lang.Object b)
Updates the display whenever the clock ticks

Specified by:
update in interface java.util.Observer
Requires:
a and b are non-null. b is a ChessEvent.
